reviews.review: There are a lot of amenities and facilities that Aiims Hospital, Madurai gives its patients which are speciality units, ICU's, diagnostic rooms, surgery rooms and treatment rooms so no matter what you are suffering from, you will get a solution here.
The expertise of the doctor at Aiims Hospital, Madurai was the main reason that I choose to go with Aiims Hospital, Madurai and I was not disappointed at all.
Aiims Hospital, Madurai has cutting edge technology and the skills of the doctors are also too good here.

This hospital provides for 24 hour security and that is really good because I had to stay in the hospital for a night and since I am living alone in the city, I had no one who could stay with me and for better recovery I needed to sleep, but they assured me that they have good security which consists of a team of females as well and I do not need to worry.
All the doctors at this hospital have good years of experience so you can definitely trust them without fear.
Aiims Hospital, Madurai ensures that you get the highest quality of care and it has top-notch facilities and amenities.

The staff at Aiims Hospital, Madurai really helped me quite a lot. They helped me get to the toilet and do my exercises that I was recommended and they were invested in me getting alright like I was a part of thier family.
This hospital has doctors who are committed to taking care of the health realted problems of the patients and they go way beyond thier means to give you good services.
This hospital has doctors that are internationally renowed, yet they do not charge a bomb for the rooms and the service.
This hospital gives you excellent treatment because the doctors and the staff are simply too good.
The infrastructure at this hospital is simply uncomparable by any other hospital and the charges for the room is also not that high.

Aiims Hospital, Madurai is fully supported with the best technology, amenities and facilities so you do not have to worry at all.

reviews.location: All India Institute Of Medical Sciences
reviews.review: Everything is fine but behaviour of the staff other than Doctors are very very poor. These people not even want to talk for a fraction of a second. This type of behaviour hurts all the patient who come from fsr flank areas of India. I would like to to request the Management to look into the matter & give them proper training on this issue.

reviews.location: All India Institute Of Medical Sciences
reviews.review: This hospital is really bullshit nurses and so called guard misbehave to every patient, people who come for treatment this is really nonchalant behaviour I`m gonna complaint a file against this hospital I have seen all the guards eat food during work hours. Rai Bareli` s aims hospital is terrible you guys need to improve you service or else I`ll surely talk to prime minister

reviews.location: All India Institute Of Medical Sciences
reviews.review: I went to All India Institute Of Medical Sciences for treatment. It was terrible. The doctors did not help me well. My health did not get better. I felt very upset. The staff were not friendly and did not listen to me. I waited a long time for help, but it was no good. I do not recommend this hospital to anyone.  ENT Vibhag IS VERY BAD And dental Vibhag is very bad

reviews.review: One of the lady security guard (Madhuri  devi)She don`t have manners how to speak she speak like a jailer not ready to understand is she hire to scold to people she should understand the situation with

reviews.location: All India Institute Of Medical Sciences
reviews.review: I had a very bad experience at All India Institute Of Medical Sciences. The staff was unhelpful, and I waited a long time to see the doctor. The place was messy and noisy. It felt very poorly managed. I expected good care, but I left feeling disappointed and frustrated. I do not recommend this hospital at all!

reviews.location: All India Institute Of Medical Sciences
reviews.review: I had a terrible experience at All India Institute Of Medical Sciences. The staff there was completely ignorant and showed no empathy towards patients. They seemed overwhelmed and uninterested, making it difficult to get any proper guidance or help. It felt like I was just another number rather than a patient in need of care. Such a disappointing visit!

reviews.review: Unfortunately, I had a disturbing experience witnessing the guards were bothering a woman who was simply trying to retrieve her job card they also ask for bribe. This incident reflects poorly on the establishment and raises questions about their commitment to customer service and basic human decency. I would say you to replace SIS guar...

reviews.review: There is proper communication by staff,security gaurds are very rude and mannerless...they don`t know how to talk to people. There is only consultant are good otherwise all staff are waste.

reviews.location: All India Institute Of Medical Sciences
reviews.review: CTVS department me Dr mayank Yadav se dur rahe. Fraud dr hai ishko jo surgery nahi bhi ata hai wo bhi case le leta hai, mere bete ka arterial switch operation success nahi kar paya aur uski jan chli gyi. Bad me pata chal ishka trial case tha.
